name: PHASEShape
desc: A collection of points that connect to form a 3D volume.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, mesh: MDLMesh)
items.desc: Creates an object that the given geometric data shapes.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, mesh: MDLMesh, materials: [PHASEMaterial])
items.desc: Creates an object of a specific material that the given geometric data shapes.

items.name: var elements: [PHASEShape.Element]
items.desc: An array of objects that collectively describe the physical characteristics of a surface.

items.name: class PHASEShape.Element
items.desc: An object that describes the characteristics of a physical surface.
